comments.author: AfterXII.2761
comments.body:
Wanze.8410:

Gw2tp already shows the amounts and values of every listing of an item in a scroll window on the top right corner.

Just wondering, if someone already made a website or spreadsheet that would visualize the supply of listings at all values in a graph?

Would be handy to identify at which value the bulk of supply is listed.

Hmm graphs as in a trading history graph that would cover ALL listings at the time it was recorded? If so, what youâ€™re asking for requires ALOT of space. At that point its a question of, is it really needed?

comments.author: Wanze.8410
comments.body:
Gw2tp already shows the amounts and values of every listing of an item in a scroll window on the top right corner.
